titleStmt.title: Here begynneth a treatyse agaynst pestele[n]ce [and] of ye infirmits
Here begynneth a litil boke the whiche traytied many gode thinges for the pestilence.
titleStmt.author: Joannes Jacobi, d. 1384. Régime de l'épidémie.
Knutsson, Bengt, d. 1462, attributed name.
Mikkelsen, Knud, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Derived from a Latin translation by Bengt Knutsson of "Régime de l'épidémie" by Joannes Jacobi. The Latin version has been attributed to Knutsson and to Knud Mikkelsen. This English version was originally published ca. 1485 as: Here begynneth a litil boke the whiche traytied many gode thinges for the pestilence.
Printer's name from colophon; publication place from and publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
